programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: Sibling rivalry between the Shifty Squares heat up as the pair try and outdo each other at the annual Ollipolis carnival. But when their antics start putting putting the whole carnival in danger, Ollie and friends have to step in and teach the brothers how to work together. Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy are trying to recreate the special Friendship Pie that's been passed down their families for generations. Unfortunately, the final ingredient on the recipe is now illegible.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Special: Digs & Discoveries: All Tracks Lead to Rome
programme.desc: While working in Italy, Thomas makes exciting discoveries, while Jack and the Pack help with building a new museum.

programme.title: Ready Jet Go!
programme.desc: Jet and family go back to visit Bortron 7 in an epic adventure. They bring Sean and Sydney along for the weekend visit, because the Earth kids are staying over for the weekend while Dr. Rafferty and Dr. Skelley visit a science conference. Carrot and Celery transform their house into "the Mothership" and fly it to Bortron 7 for a presentation to their bosses at the Intergalactic Travel Writers home office.

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The children helps the totem heads find the world's most delicious banana in the Jungle. Some of them took the shortcut while the others stick to the route on the map. But something unexpected awaits them. Using the power of an ancient statue, Mr Explorer manages to control the monkeys. The children has to find a potion to destroy the artifact and protect the totem heads from being captured.

programme.title: Miraculous World - New York, United Heroez
programme.desc: Marinette's class is headed to New York, the city of superheroes, for French American Friendship Week, but the American superheroes may find themselves in need of help while there.

programme.title: Angry Birds
programme.desc: The animation series sees our birdy protagonists battling against the long-suffering Piggies in an engaging world full of surprises!

programme.title: HSBC Singapore Rugby Sevens 2022[Highlights]
programme.desc: Singapore will welcome the world's top rugby sevens players from 16 teams to the National Stadium at Singapore Sports Hub on 9 & 10 April 2022. The Singapore leg is the fifth of nine tournaments in the men's HSBC World Rugby Sevens Series 2022, which started with two events in Dubai in November and December 2021. South Africa has dominated the 2022 season thus far, winning the first four events of the series.

programme.title: Andrea Bocelli: Cinema
programme.desc: International superstar Andrea Bocelli returns with this majestic performance of songs from his new eagerly awaited album, Cinema. Celebrating the greatest movie songs of all time, Bocelli brings to life a collection of songs etched into the culture and hearts of generations. These include epic theme songs featured in films such as Doctor Zhivago, Love Story, The Godfather, Life is Beautiful, Gladiator, The Postman, Breakfast At Tiffanys and many more.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune:
programme.sub-title: Leslie Jones, Tony Hawk & Chandra Wilson
programme.desc: Hosted by pop culture legends Pat Sajak and Vanna White, "Celebrity Wheel of Fortune" welcomes celebrity contestants to come spin the world's most famous wheel and solve word puzzles for a chance to win up to one million dollars. All of the money won by the celebrity contestants will go to a charity of their choice.

programme.title: Maya The Bee
programme.desc: Maya, a young wayward bee, is suspected of being an accomplice when the Queen's Royal Jelly is stolen. Together with her friend Willy, Maya must find out the truth and redeem herself.

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher
programme.desc: Iz turns to his genius best friend Sanjay, to help him work out why he suddenly has an imaginary friend. With the stresses of exams, bullies, girls, his mum no wonder he's seeing things. When Bonmasher helps Iz stand up to his bullies, they think that's all he was around for. Or was he?

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: This heart-warming and fascinating returnable series brings you the most surprising animal friends from around the world. From a duck that won't enter the water without her Labrador retriever guardian, to a very special friendship between a rhino and a lamb, to an elephant who thinks she's a buffalo. We travel the globe to track down the cutest, funniest and most unusual animal relationships and bring you the delightful and compelling stories behind these bizarre animal bonds,.

programme.desc: Bibi encourages Hiccup and Sneeze to exercise, but they're not keen on the idea. Bibi even prepares a workout routine for them, but they trick her into thinking they're following it by pretending to exercise only when she checks in on them.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus
programme.desc: Late at night, Tayo sees a baby dinosaur with supernatural powers in Namsan. But when his friends don't believe what he says, Tayo comes back to Namsan with his little buses. And as Tayo says, the little buses meet the baby dinosaur. When the researchers try to catch the dinosaur, the little busses decide to hide him. The little buses are named "Tino" for a baby dinosaur and have fun together in the garage.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A game of hide and seek results in the discovery of a baby Sumatran rhino! Leo, Katie and Hero go to Sumatra, Indonesia to return the rhino to its mother. Today's mission: return a white-bellied woodpecker to its rightful place in the rainforest! The Junior Rangers try to do just that, but come under attack by a swarm of wasps. Will the Junior Rangers succeed in their mission, or face the sting of defeat?

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series

programme.sub-title: You are what you Eat: Detox the Indian Way
programme.desc: Food in India is swiftly becoming more than just a bunch of elements with lots of spices, cooked and served up in large platters to feed family and friends. A handful of Restaurants are becoming veritable museums, thanks to their new attitude to food. In this episode, interspersed with the budding art museums, we seek out outstanding chefs who emphasize new techniques in Indian food preparation, bringing in a touch of the Japanese and French styles of presenting food.
